author: The Virtual Reality Show
description:
Thanks Xsolla for sponsoring the video! Check out the Xsolla Cash
Mastercard ® here: https://bit.ly/3JiHEd4

Today I’m exploring why 80% of people experience cybersickness in VR. I go over what motion sickness really is, how to prepare for it, what contributes to it, and the scientific data on building VR endurance! Including theories and solutions on how VR can eventually break through this barrier and one day become mainstream. Hope this helps some people learn how to solve their cybersickness for good. :) Comment your thoughts below!
